A screen reader that can identify and describe the visual content on a webpage, including images, videos, and text.
A tactile display that can be used to navigate and interact with smartphones, tablets, and other electronic devices.
A virtual reality system that allows visually impaired individuals to experience and interact with virtual environments.
An AI-powered personal assistant that can help with tasks such as scheduling, reminders, and email management.
A smart home system that can control lighting, temperature, and other smart devices to create a more accessible living environment.
